scripts.ci-deploy-base: S3_BUCKET={S3_BUCKET} ENV=${ENV} VITE_APP_SHA=${GIT_HEAD:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)} VITE_APP_VERSION=$(node -pe 'require("./package.json").version') npm run build:${ENV} && aws s3 sync build/ s3://${S3_BUCKET} --profile default --region us-east-1 --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile default --distribution-id ${CLOUDFRONT_ID} --paths '/*' --region us-east-1
scripts.ci-deploy:development: ENV=development PREFIX=development CLOUDFRONT_ID=E1SATTTBQMF1YE S3_BUCKET=harbor-lighthouse-care-telemed-intake npm run ci-deploy-base
scripts.ci-deploy:production: ENV=production PREFIX=production CLOUDFRONT_ID=EK80396YEPHI1 S3_BUCKET=harbor-care-telemed-intake npm run ci-deploy-base
